TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageIndexConverter extends System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter

summary.span: 提供在图像索引数据与字符串之间实现互相转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于将索引值的转换到和从其他数据类型，通常。The class is used to convert index values of an to and from other data types, typically . 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基本类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 通常情况下，您并不直接创建的实例。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 改为调用方法的。Instead, call the method of . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型转换器仅可以将转换的 32 位有符号的整数对象与字符串。This type converter only can convert a 32-bit signed integer object to and from a string. `context`可用于提取有关从调用此类型转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from. 这可能为 `null`，因此应总是对其进行检查。This may be `null`, so you should always check. 同样，上下文对象上的属性也可能返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object may also return `null`.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.

summary.span: 返回与指定的格式上下文关联的图像列表的标准索引值的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of standard index values for the image list associated with the specified format context.

returns.span: 包含标准有效索引值集的 。

span.span: A that holds a standard set of valid index values.

returns.span: 如果未找到任何图像列表，则此集合将包含值为 -1 的单个对象。

span.span: If no image list is found, this collection will contain a single object with a value of -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回与关联的图像列表索引值的集合属性的`context`参数。Returns a collection of index values for image lists associated with the property of the `context` parameter. 如果找不到，则将有关此类列表搜索组件的父级。If an is not found, then the parent of the component will be searched for such a list. 通常尝试使用之前，调用方法对和方法。Typically the method is called to before an attempt is made to use the and methods.

This implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果返回的列表方法是独占的则其他任何值不都有效。If the list returned by the method is exclusive, then no other values are valid. 这是典型的枚举的数据类型。This is typical of an enumerated data type. 如果该列表不是独占的则有其他有效的值的标准列表值之外提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides. 在此类型转换器中实现时，此方法始终返回`false`。As implemented in this type converter, this method always returns `false`. 通常尝试使用之前，调用方法对和方法。Typically the method is called to before an attempt is made to use the and methods.
